Justification: Suppliers/SaaS tools can introduce data compromise risk; due diligence reduces third-party risk
Notes: SUP-001 supplier register + SUP-003 assessment for key supplier (baseline portfolio)

Control Description (short): Managing information security in the ICT supply chain
Justification: Supply chain controls reduce compromise via vendor dependencies and integrations
Notes: Initial supplier assessment performed for baseline; expand to all critical suppliers over time

Control Description (short): Information security for use of cloud services
Justification: Cloud posture must be governed to prevent misconfiguration and data exposure
Notes: Will document cloud security baseline + configuration review evidence

Control Description (short): Information security incident management planning and preparation
Justification: IR planning reduces time-to-contain and ensures consistent response
Notes: IR-001 plan + IR-002 tabletop record captured

Control Description (short): Assessment and decision on information security events
Justification: Triage/decision rules ensure correct classification and escalation
Notes: IR process includes triage criteria and severity handling (tabletop exercised)

Justification: Defined response steps enable containment, eradication, recovery, and comms
Notes: IR roles/responsibilities and response workflow documented and exercised

Justification: Evidence handling supports investigations and accountability
Notes: IR record includes evidence capture guidance for portfolio scenario

Justification: PII handling controls reduce legal/regulatory exposure
Notes: Will add PII handling procedure + retention rules + evidence

Control Description (short): Information security awareness education and training
Justification: Human-factor risk is high in remote-first SaaS; training reduces phishing/misuse
Notes: TRN-001 training record completed and captured as EV-015

Justification: Restricting code access and reviewing changes reduces malicious/unsafe changes
Notes: Branch protection + PR approvals + access review record (AR-002)

Justification: A defined vuln workflow + SLA reduces exposure to known exploitable issues
Notes: Dependabot enabled + vuln procedure + vuln log established

Justification: Backup restore tests prove recovery capability and reduce downtime/data loss
Notes: BC-001 backup/restore test record captured as EV-012

Justification: Controlled changes prevent outages and unauthorized modification
Notes: Branch protection + PR-based change workflow evidence
